titleStmt.title: An excellent new song; or, a true touch of the times, giving you a full and true account of the transactions, from King James the First, to the present reign of our Soveraign Lord King James the Second. To the tune of, The loyal health. Or, Why are my eyes still flowing, &c.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
